func.title: DrawParticleLine

param.name: particle
param.desc: Type of particle to be created.

param.name: x0
param.desc: X coordinate of the starting point. Offset in local calls.

param.name: y0
param.desc: Y coordinate of the starting point. Offset in local calls.

param.name: x1
param.desc: X coordinate of the end point. Offset in local calls.

param.name: y1
param.desc: Y coordinate of the end point. Offset in local calls.

param.name: prtdist
param.desc: Distance between particles. This may not be applied exactly as particles are always spread evenly over the total distance.

param.name: xdir
param.desc: Initial horizontal velocity in 1/10th pixels per frame or as a value provider.

param.name: ydir
param.desc: Initial vertical velocity in 1/10th pixels per frame or as a value provider.

param.name: lifetime
param.desc: Duration of particle in frames or as a value provider.

func.desc: Creates a line of particles between two points. Returns the number of particles created.
func.remark: For more information about the value provider and particle definition parameters, see CreateParticle.

example.code: DrawParticleLine("MagicSpark", 0, 0, GetCursor()->GetX()-GetX(), GetCursor()->GetY()-GetY(), 20, 0, 0, 12, {Prototype = Particles_Flash(), Size = 20, R = 50, G = 50, B = 255});
example.text: Creates a line from the calling object to the selected clonk of the first player using a blue flash particle.
